    Publications

    Full list of my publications on ADS

    First Author Papers

    • Modeling baryonic physics in future weak lensing surveys.
      H.-J. Huang, T. Eifler, R. Mandelbaum, S. Dodelson. 2018, arXiv: 1809.01146

    • Intrinsic alignment in redMaPPer clusters - II. Radial alignment of satellites towards cluster centres.
      H.-J. Huang, R. Mandelbaum, P. Freeman, Y.-C. Chen, E. Rozo, E. Rykoff. 2018, MNRAS, 474, 4772.

    • Intrinsic alignments in redMaPPer clusters - I. Central galaxy alignments and angular segregation of satellites.
      H.-J. Huang, R. Mandelbaum, P. Freeman, Y.-C. Chen, E. Rozo, E. Rykoff, E. Baxter. 2016, MNRAS, 463, 222.

    Co-author Papers

    • An Analysis Framework for Understanding the Origin of Nuclear Activity in Low-power Radio Galaxies.
      Y.-T. Lin, H.-J. Huang, Y.-C. Chen. 2018, AJ, 155, 188.

    • On Detecting Halo Assembly Bias with Galaxy Populations.
      Y.-T. Lin, R. Mandelbaum, Y.-H. Huang, H.-J. Huang, N. Dalal, B. Diemer, H.-Y. Jian, A. Kravtsov. 2016, ApJ, 819, 119.

    • Stellar mass assembly of brightest cluster galaxies at late times.
      T. Inagaki, Y.-T. Lin, H.-J. Huang, B.-C. Hsieh, N. Sugiyama. 2015, MNRAS, 446, 1107.
